Headline: #100 Jeffery Manor Express Temporary Reroute at Yates/98th
ShortDescription: 100 Jeffery Manor Express buses are temporarily rerouted via 95th, Jeffery, Van Vlissingen, and 100th due to, street blockage at Yates/98th.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
#100 Jeffery Manor Express buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions via 95th, Jeffery, Van Vlissingen, and 100th due to, street blockage at Yates/98th.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: Howard-bound Yellow Line Service Delayed at Dempster-Skokie
ShortDescription: Howard-bound Yellow Line trains are standing at Skokie/Dempster due to police activity. Crews working to restore service.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Howard-bound Yellow Line trains are standing at Skokie/Dempster due to police activity.
Personnel are working to restore service. Allow extra travel time.
